   21: %%
   22: 
   23: -module(ssl_ECC_SUITE).
   24: 
   25: -behaviour(ct_suite).
   26: 
   27: -include("ssl_test_lib.hrl").
   28: -include_lib("ssl/src/ssl_record.hrl").
   29: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   30: -include_lib("public_key/include/public_key.hrl").
   31: 
   32: 
   33: %% Common test
   34: -export([all/0,
   35:          groups/0,
   36:          init_per_suite/1,
   37:          init_per_group/2,
   38:          init_per_testcase/2,
   39:          end_per_suite/1,
   40:          end_per_group/2,
   41:          end_per_testcase/2
   42:         ]).
   43: 
   44: %% Test cases
   45: -export([ecc_default_order/1,
   46:          ecc_default_order_custom_curves/1,
   47:          ecc_client_order/1,
   48:          ecc_client_order_custom_curves/1,
   49:          ecc_unknown_curve/1,
   50:          client_ecdh_rsa_server_ecdhe_ecdsa_server_custom/1,
   51:          client_ecdh_rsa_server_ecdhe_rsa_server_custom/1,
   52:          client_ecdhe_rsa_server_ecdhe_ecdsa_server_custom/1,
   53:          client_ecdhe_rsa_server_ecdhe_rsa_server_custom/1,
   54:          client_ecdhe_rsa_server_ecdh_rsa_server_custom/1,
   55:          client_ecdhe_ecdsa_server_ecdhe_ecdsa_server_custom/1,
   56:          client_ecdhe_ecdsa_server_ecdhe_rsa_server_custom/1,
   57:          client_ecdhe_ecdsa_server_ecdhe_ecdsa_client_custom/1,
   58:          client_ecdhe_rsa_server_ecdhe_ecdsa_client_custom/1,
   59:          client_ecdsa_server_ecdsa_with_raw_key/1,
   60:          mix_sign/1
   61:         ]).
   62: 
   63: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   64: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
   65: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   66: 
   67: all() ->
   68:     [
   69:      {group, 'tlsv1.2'},
   70:      {group, 'tlsv1.1'},
   71:      {group, 'tlsv1'},
   72:      {group, 'dtlsv1.2'},
   73:      {group, 'dtlsv1'}
   74:     ].
   75: 
   76: groups() ->
   77:     [
   78:      {'tlsv1.2', [], [mix_sign | test_cases()]},
   79:      {'tlsv1.1', [], test_cases()},
   80:      {'tlsv1', [], test_cases()},
   81:      {'dtlsv1.2', [], [mix_sign | test_cases()]},
   82:      {'dtlsv1', [], test_cases()}
   83:     ].
   84: 
   85: test_cases()->
   86:     misc() ++ ecc_negotiation().
   87: 
   88: misc()->
   89:     [client_ecdsa_server_ecdsa_with_raw_key].
   90: 
   91: ecc_negotiation() ->
   92:     [ecc_default_order,
   93:      ecc_default_order_custom_curves,
   94:      ecc_client_order,
   95:      ecc_client_order_custom_curves,
   96:      ecc_unknown_curve,
   97:      client_ecdh_rsa_server_ecdhe_ecdsa_server_custom,
   98:      client_ecdh_rsa_server_ecdhe_rsa_server_custom,
   99:      client_ecdhe_rsa_server_ecdhe_ecdsa_server_custom,
  100:      client_ecdhe_rsa_server_ecdhe_rsa_server_custom,
  101:      client_ecdhe_rsa_server_ecdh_rsa_server_custom,
  102:      client_ecdhe_ecdsa_server_ecdhe_ecdsa_server_custom,
  103:      client_ecdhe_ecdsa_server_ecdhe_rsa_server_custom,
  104:      client_ecdhe_ecdsa_server_ecdhe_ecdsa_client_custom,
  105:      client_ecdhe_rsa_server_ecdhe_ecdsa_client_custom
  106:     ].
  107: 
  108: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  109: init_per_suite(Config0) ->
  110:     end_per_suite(Config0),
  111:     try crypto:start() of
  112: 	ok ->
  113:             case ssl_test_lib:sufficient_crypto_support(cipher_ec) of
  114:                 true ->
  115:                     Config0;
  116:                 false ->
  117:                     {skip, "Crypto does not support ECC"}
  118:             end
  119:     catch _:_ ->
  120:             {skip, "Crypto did not start"}
  121:     end.
  122: 
  123: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
  124:     application:stop(ssl),
  125:     application:stop(crypto).
  126: 
  127: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  128: init_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
  129:     case ssl_test_lib:is_protocol_version(GroupName) of
  130: 	true ->
  131:             ?CT_LOG("Ciphers: ~p~n ", [ssl:cipher_suites(default, GroupName)]),
  132:             ssl_test_lib:init_per_group(GroupName,
  133:                                         [{client_type, erlang},
  134:                                          {server_type, erlang},
  135:                                          {version, GroupName} | Config]);
  136:         false ->
  137:             Config
  138:     end.
  139: 
  140: end_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
  141:     ssl_test_lib:end_per_group(GroupName, Config).
  142: 
  143: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  144: 
  145: init_per_testcase(TestCase, Config) ->
  146:     ssl_test_lib:ct_log_supported_protocol_versions(Config),
  147:     end_per_testcase(TestCase, Config),
  148:     ssl:start(),
  149:     ct:timetrap({seconds, 5}),
  150:     Config.
  151: 
  152: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
  153:     application:stop(ssl),
  154:     Config.
  155: 
  156: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  157: %% Test Cases --------------------------------------------------------
  158: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  159: %% Test different certificate chain types, note that it is the servers
  160: %% chain that affect what cipher suite that will be chosen
  161: 
  162: client_ecdsa_server_ecdsa_with_raw_key(Config)  when is_list(Config) ->
  163:      Default = ssl_test_lib:default_cert_chain_conf(),
  164:     {COpts0, SOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_ec_cert_chains([{server_chain, Default},
  165:                                                        {client_chain, Default}]
  166:                                                      , ecdhe_ecdsa, ecdhe_ecdsa, Config),
  167:     COpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(COpts0, Config),
  168:     SOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(SOpts0, Config),
  169:     ServerKeyFile = proplists:get_value(keyfile, SOpts),
  170:     {ok, PemBin} = file:read_file(ServerKeyFile),
  171:     PemEntries = public_key:pem_decode(PemBin),
  172:      {'ECPrivateKey', Key, not_encrypted} = proplists:lookup('ECPrivateKey', PemEntries),
  173:     ServerKey = {'ECPrivateKey', Key},
  174:     SType = proplists:get_value(server_type, Config),
  175:     CType = proplists:get_value(client_type, Config),
  176:     {Server, Port} = ssl_test_lib:start_server_with_raw_key(SType,
  177:                                                             [{key, ServerKey} | proplists:delete(keyfile, SOpts)],
  178:                                                             Config),
  179:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client(CType, Port, COpts, Config),
  180:     ssl_test_lib:gen_check_result(Server, SType, Client, CType),
  181:     ssl_test_lib:stop(Server, Client).
  182: 
  183: ecc_default_order(Config) ->
  184:     Default = ssl_test_lib:default_cert_chain_conf(),
  185:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
  186:     DefaultCurve = hd(tls_v1:ec_curves(default, Version)),
  187:     {COpts0, SOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_ec_cert_chains([{server_chain, Default},
  188:                                                          {client_chain, Default}],
  189:                                                         ecdhe_ecdsa, ecdhe_ecdsa,
  190:                                                         Config, DefaultCurve),
  191:     COpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(COpts0, Config),
  192:     SOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(SOpts0, Config),
  193:     ECCOpts = [],
  194:     case ssl_test_lib:supported_eccs([{eccs, [DefaultCurve]}], Version) of
  195:         true ->  ssl_test_lib:ecc_test(DefaultCurve, COpts, SOpts, [], ECCOpts, Config);
  196:         false -> {skip, "unsupported named curves"}
  197:      end.
  198: 
  199: ecc_default_order_custom_curves(Config) ->
  200:     Default = ssl_test_lib:default_cert_chain_conf(),
  201:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
  202:     DefaultCurve = hd(tls_v1:ec_curves(default, Version)),
  203:     {COpts0, SOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_ec_cert_chains([{server_chain, Default},
  204:                                                          {client_chain, Default}],
  205:                                                         ecdhe_ecdsa, ecdhe_ecdsa,
  206:                                                         Config, DefaultCurve),
  207:     COpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(COpts0, Config),
  208:     SOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(SOpts0, Config),
  209:     ECCOpts = [{eccs, [secp256r1, DefaultCurve]}],
  210:     case ssl_test_lib:supported_eccs(ECCOpts, Version) of
  211:          true ->  ssl_test_lib:ecc_test(DefaultCurve, COpts, SOpts, [], ECCOpts, Config);
  212:         false -> {skip, "unsupported named curves"}
  213:     end.
  214: 
  215: ecc_client_order(Config) ->
  216:     Default = ssl_test_lib:default_cert_chain_conf(),
  217:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
  218:     DefaultCurve = hd(tls_v1:ec_curves(default, Version)),
  219:     {COpts0, SOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_ec_cert_chains([{server_chain, Default},
  220:                                                          {client_chain, Default}],
  221:                                                         ecdhe_ecdsa, ecdhe_ecdsa,
  222:                                                         Config, DefaultCurve),
  223:     COpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(COpts0, Config),
  224:     SOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(SOpts0, Config),
  225:     ECCOpts = [{honor_ecc_order, false}],
  226:     case ssl_test_lib:supported_eccs([{eccs, [DefaultCurve]}], Version) of
  227:          true -> ssl_test_lib:ecc_test(DefaultCurve, COpts, SOpts, [], ECCOpts, Config);
  228:         false -> {skip, "unsupported named curves"}
  229:     end.
  230: 
  231: ecc_client_order_custom_curves(Config) ->
  232:     Default = ssl_test_lib:default_cert_chain_conf(),
  233:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
  234:     DefaultCurve = hd(tls_v1:ec_curves(default, Version)),
  235:     {COpts0, SOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_ec_cert_chains([{server_chain, Default},
  236:                                                         {client_chain, Default}],
  237:                                                         ecdhe_ecdsa, ecdhe_ecdsa,
  238:                                                         Config, DefaultCurve),
  239:     COpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(COpts0, Config),
  240:     SOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(SOpts0, Config),
  241:     ECCOpts = [{honor_ecc_order, false}, {eccs, [secp256r1, DefaultCurve]}],
  242:     case ssl_test_lib:supported_eccs(ECCOpts, Version) of
  243:         true -> ssl_test_lib:ecc_test(DefaultCurve, COpts, SOpts, [], ECCOpts, Config);
  244:         false -> {skip, "unsupported named curves"}
  245:     end.
  246: 
  247: ecc_unknown_curve(Config) ->
  248:     Default = ssl_test_lib:default_cert_chain_conf(),
  249:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
  250:     {COpts0, SOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_ec_cert_chains([{server_chain, Default},
  251:                                                        {client_chain, Default}],
  252:                                                       ecdhe_ecdsa, ecdhe_ecdsa, Config),
  253:     COpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(COpts0, Config),
  254:     SOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(SOpts0, Config),
  255:     ECCALL = ssl:ec_curves(all, Version),
  256:     SECCOpts = [{eccs, [hd(ECCALL)]}],
  257:     CECCOpts = [{eccs, tl(ECCALL)}],
  258:     ssl_test_lib:ecc_test_error(COpts, SOpts, CECCOpts, SECCOpts, Config).
  259: 
  260: client_ecdh_rsa_server_ecdhe_ecdsa_server_custom(Config) ->
  261:     Default = ssl_test_lib:default_cert_chain_conf(),
  262:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
  263:     DefaultCurve = hd(tls_v1:ec_curves(default, Version)),
  264:     {COpts0, SOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_ec_cert_chains([{server_chain, Default},
  265:                                                        {client_chain, Default}],
  266:                                                         ecdh_rsa, ecdhe_ecdsa, Config),
  267:     COpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(COpts0, Config),
  268:     SOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(SOpts0, Config),
  269:     ECCOpts = [{honor_ecc_order, true}, {eccs, [secp256r1, DefaultCurve]}],
  270:      case ssl_test_lib:supported_eccs(ECCOpts, Version) of
  271:          true -> ssl_test_lib:ecc_test(secp256r1, COpts, SOpts, [], ECCOpts, Config);
  272:          false -> {skip, "unsupported named curves"}
  273:      end.
  274: 
  275: client_ecdh_rsa_server_ecdhe_rsa_server_custom(Config) ->
  276:     Default = ssl_test_lib:default_cert_chain_conf(),
  277:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
  278:     DefaultCurve = hd(tls_v1:ec_curves(default, Version)),
  279:     {COpts0, SOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_ec_cert_chains([{server_chain, Default},
  280:                                                          {client_chain, Default}],
  281:                                                         ecdh_rsa, ecdhe_rsa, Config),
  282:     COpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(COpts0, Config),
  283:     SOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(SOpts0, Config),
  284:     ECCOpts = [{honor_ecc_order, true}, {eccs, [secp256r1, DefaultCurve]}],
  285: 
  286:     case ssl_test_lib:supported_eccs(ECCOpts, Version) of
  287:         true -> ssl_test_lib:ecc_test(secp256r1, COpts, SOpts, [], ECCOpts, Config);
  288:         false -> {skip, "unsupported named curves"}
  289:     end.
  290: 
  291: client_ecdhe_rsa_server_ecdhe_ecdsa_server_custom(Config) ->
  292:     Default = ssl_test_lib:default_cert_chain_conf(),
  293:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
  294:     DefaultCurve = hd(tls_v1:ec_curves(default, Version)),
  295:     {COpts0, SOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_ec_cert_chains([{server_chain, Default},
  296:                                                          {client_chain, Default}],
  297:                                                         ecdhe_rsa, ecdhe_ecdsa, Config),
  298:     COpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(COpts0, Config),
  299:     SOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(SOpts0, Config),
  300:     ECCOpts = [{honor_ecc_order, true}, {eccs, [secp256r1, DefaultCurve]}],
  301:     case ssl_test_lib:supported_eccs(ECCOpts, Version) of
  302:          true -> ssl_test_lib:ecc_test(secp256r1, COpts, SOpts, [], ECCOpts, Config);
  303:         false -> {skip, "unsupported named curves"}
  304:     end.
  305: 
  306: client_ecdhe_rsa_server_ecdhe_rsa_server_custom(Config) ->
  307:     Default = ssl_test_lib:default_cert_chain_conf(),
  308:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
  309:     DefaultCurve = hd(tls_v1:ec_curves(default, Version)),
  310:     {COpts0, SOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_ec_cert_chains([{server_chain, Default},
  311:                                                          {client_chain, Default}],
  312:                                                         ecdhe_rsa, ecdhe_rsa, Config),
  313: 
  314:     COpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(COpts0, Config),
  315:     SOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(SOpts0, Config),
  316:     ECCOpts = [{honor_ecc_order, true}, {eccs, [secp256r1, DefaultCurve]}],
  317:     case ssl_test_lib:supported_eccs(ECCOpts, Version) of
  318:         true -> ssl_test_lib:ecc_test(secp256r1, COpts, SOpts, [], ECCOpts, Config);
  319:         false -> {skip, "unsupported named curves"}
  320:      end.
  321: client_ecdhe_rsa_server_ecdh_rsa_server_custom(Config) ->
  322:     Default = ssl_test_lib:default_cert_chain_conf(),
  323:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
  324:     DefaultCurve = hd(tls_v1:ec_curves(default, Version)),
  325:     Ext = x509_test:extensions([{key_usage, [keyEncipherment]}]),
  326:     {COpts0, SOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_ec_cert_chains([{server_chain, [[], [], [{extensions, Ext}]]},
  327:                                                          {client_chain, Default}],
  328:                                                         ecdhe_rsa, ecdh_rsa, Config),
  329: 
  330:     COpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(COpts0, Config),
  331:     SOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(SOpts0, Config),
  332:     ECCOpts = [{honor_ecc_order, true}, {eccs, [secp256r1, DefaultCurve]}],
  333:     Expected = secp256r1, %% The certificate curve
  334: 
  335:     case ssl_test_lib:supported_eccs(ECCOpts, Version) of
  336:         true -> ssl_test_lib:ecc_test(Expected, COpts, SOpts, [], ECCOpts, Config);
  337:         false -> {skip, "unsupported named curves"}
  338:     end.
  339: 
  340: client_ecdhe_ecdsa_server_ecdhe_ecdsa_server_custom(Config) ->
  341:     Default = ssl_test_lib:default_cert_chain_conf(),
  342:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
  343:     DefaultCurve = hd(tls_v1:ec_curves(default, Version)),
  344:     {COpts0, SOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_ec_cert_chains([{server_chain, Default},
  345:                                                        {client_chain, Default}],
  346:                                                         ecdhe_ecdsa, ecdhe_ecdsa, Config),
  347:     COpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(COpts0, Config),
  348:     SOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(SOpts0, Config),
  349:     ECCOpts = [{honor_ecc_order, true}, {eccs, [secp256r1, DefaultCurve]}],
  350:     case ssl_test_lib:supported_eccs(ECCOpts, Version) of
  351:         true -> ssl_test_lib:ecc_test(secp256r1, COpts, SOpts, [], ECCOpts, Config);
  352:         false -> {skip, "unsupported named curves"}
  353:     end.
  354: 
  355: client_ecdhe_ecdsa_server_ecdhe_rsa_server_custom(Config) ->
  356:     Default = ssl_test_lib:default_cert_chain_conf(),
  357:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
  358:     DefaultCurve = hd(tls_v1:ec_curves(default, Version)),
  359:     {COpts0, SOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_ec_cert_chains([{server_chain, Default},
  360:                                                          {client_chain, Default}],
  361:                                                         ecdhe_ecdsa, ecdhe_rsa, Config),
  362:     COpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(COpts0, Config),
  363:     SOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(SOpts0, Config),
  364:     ECCOpts = [{honor_ecc_order, true}, {eccs, [secp256r1, DefaultCurve]}],
  365:     case ssl_test_lib:supported_eccs(ECCOpts, Version) of
  366:         true -> ssl_test_lib:ecc_test(secp256r1, COpts, SOpts, [], ECCOpts, Config);
  367:         false -> {skip, "unsupported named curves"}
  368:     end.
  369: 
  370: client_ecdhe_ecdsa_server_ecdhe_ecdsa_client_custom(Config) ->
  371:     Default = ssl_test_lib:default_cert_chain_conf(),
  372:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
  373:     DefaultCurve = hd(tls_v1:ec_curves(default, Version)),
  374:     {COpts0, SOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_ec_cert_chains([{server_chain, Default},
  375:                                                        {client_chain, Default}],
  376:                                                         ecdhe_ecdsa, ecdhe_ecdsa, Config),
  377:     COpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(COpts0, Config),
  378:     SOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(SOpts0, Config),
  379:     ECCOpts = [{eccs, [secp256r1, DefaultCurve]}],
  380:     case ssl_test_lib:supported_eccs(ECCOpts, Version) of
  381:         true -> ssl_test_lib:ecc_test(secp256r1, COpts, SOpts, ECCOpts, [], Config);
  382:         false -> {skip, "unsupported named curves"}
  383:     end.
  384: 
  385: client_ecdhe_rsa_server_ecdhe_ecdsa_client_custom(Config) ->
  386:     Default = ssl_test_lib:default_cert_chain_conf(),
  387:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
  388:     DefaultCurve = hd(tls_v1:ec_curves(default, Version)),
  389:     {COpts0, SOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_ec_cert_chains([{server_chain, Default},
  390:                                                          {client_chain, Default}],
  391:                                                          ecdhe_rsa, ecdhe_ecdsa, Config),
  392:     COpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(COpts0, Config),
  393:     SOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(SOpts0, Config),
  394:     ECCOpts = [{eccs, [secp256r1, DefaultCurve]}],
  395:     case ssl_test_lib:supported_eccs(ECCOpts, Version) of
  396:         true -> ssl_test_lib:ecc_test(secp256r1, COpts, SOpts, ECCOpts, [], Config);
  397:         false -> {skip, "unsupported named curves"}
  398:     end.
  399: 
  400: mix_sign(Config) ->
  401:     mix_sign_rsa_peer(Config),
  402:     mix_sign_ecdsa_peer(Config).
  403: 
  404: mix_sign_ecdsa_peer(Config) ->
  405:     {COpts0, SOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_mix_cert([{mix, peer_ecc} |Config]),
  406:     COpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(COpts0, Config),
  407:     SOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(SOpts0, Config),
  408:     ECDHE_ECDSA =
  409:         ssl:filter_cipher_suites(ssl:cipher_suites(default, 'tlsv1.2'),
  410:                                  [{key_exchange, fun(ecdhe_ecdsa) -> true; (_) -> false end}]),
  411:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(COpts, [{ciphers, ECDHE_ECDSA} | SOpts], Config).
  412: 
  413: 
  414: mix_sign_rsa_peer(Config) ->
  415:     {COpts0, SOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_mix_cert([{mix, peer_rsa} |Config]),
  416:     COpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(COpts0, Config),
  417:     SOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(SOpts0, Config),
  418:     ECDHE_RSA =
  419:         ssl:filter_cipher_suites(ssl:cipher_suites(default, 'tlsv1.2'),
  420:                                  [{key_exchange, fun(ecdhe_rsa) -> true; (_) -> false end}]),
  421:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(COpts, [{ciphers, ECDHE_RSA} | SOpts], Config).
